page.title: 04HOW TEACHERS TRAVEL TO WORK
page.content: THIS IS A SURVEY SHOWING HOW 43 OF THE 51 TEACHING STAFF OF THE MANOR COMMUNITY COLLEGE TRAVEL TO SCHOOL EACH DAY,HOW FAR THEY TRAVEL AND WHAT TRANSPORT THEY OWN. 42 TEACHERS OWN A{MOTOR CAR. 31 TEACHERS OWN A{BICYCLE. 2 TEACHERS OWN A{MOTORCYCLE. 35 TEACHERS TRAVEL TO WORK BY CAR. 11 TEACHERS TRAVEL TO WORK BY BICYCLE { }2 TEACHERS TRAVEL TO WORK BY M/CYCLE { }4 TEACHERS USUALLY WALK TO SCHOOL. 14 TEACHERS TRAVEL ABOUT 1 MILE A DAY, 18 TRAVEL BETWEEN 1 AND 10 MILES, 3 TRAVEL BETWEEN 10 AND 20 MILES, 5 TRAVEL BETWEEN 20 AND 30 MILES, 3 TRAVEL BETWEEN 30 AND 40 MILES, 1 TRAVELS BETWEEN 40 AND 50 MILES, 2 TRAVEL MORE THAN 80 MILES A DAY. IT SHOWS THAT ALL BUT ONE OF OUR STAFF OWN A CAR AND MOST USE THEM FOR WORK, USUALLY ON JOURNEYS LESS THAN 10 MILES
